title: Looking after a vulnerable adult as a shared lives carer (Portsmouth City Council)
text: ( Source : Portsmouth City Council ) Portsmouth celebrates national Shared Lives week with drop-in events at Southsea Library and Civic Offices, where you can find out more about how Shared Lives carers open their home and family life to
